Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the effectiveness of an occupancy tax in the town of DeWitt
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of an occupancy tax in the town of DeWitt to September 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 296 of the laws of 2023 amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax in the town of DeWitt, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
